text: means "steel" in Japanese. It may also refer to: * Hagane: The Final Conflict, a video game * Hagane, a manga by Masaomi Kanzaki * a Space Noah Class starship from the game Super Robot Taisen: Original Generation and its sequel * the nickname of the 4th Tank Division of the Imperial Japanese Army during the second world war * a central character in the Japanese manga anthology Glass Wings * a steel used for making blades (which may also be called tamahagane), such as those in Japanese swords, chisels or planes
title: Hagane
